title: So my bank thought riot was a fraud
body: My bank thought riot games was some fake stuff stealing money from me ( well it is but I allow it , I mean like these new skins how can you not buy them am I right?) . Well I know my account will get banned soon and I already turned in a ticket , is there anything I can do to stop the ban from happening

replies.body: Your best bet would be to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as possible to try and clear this up. If your bank only did a stop payment and hasn't reversed any charges, you should be fine. In any case, we can't go over billing information here on the boards, but we'll be able to get this taken care of in your ticket!
